about_description: Clip Queue integrates into your chat and queues clips submitted by viewers. Clips can be easily viewed through the web interface with support for multiple platforms and real-time synchronization.
about_feature_commands_description: Moderators of the channel can use chat commands to interact directly with the queue.
about_feature_connect_description: Log in to automatically connect to your Twitch chat. Clips submitted by users in chat will be queued.
about_feature_duplicate_prevent_descript: Duplicate clips will not make it into the queue. This includes clips watched during previous sessions.
about_feature_moderation_description: Moderation performed in chat will effect the clips submitted by those users.
about_feature_popularity_description: Clips being repeately submitted by many users will rise up in the queue allowing it to be viewed sooner.
about_feature_settings_description: Personalize your experience through the vast choices of customizable settings.
about_fork_notice: This is a fork of the original Clip Queue project with additional features and enhancements.
about_license: Released under the MIT License. Free and open source software.
allowed_commands_description: Commands allowed to be used in chat.
allowed_providers_description: Content from these providers will be allowed in the queue.
auto_mod_description: When a user has their chat message deleted, is timed out, or banned, the clips they submitted will be removed.
autoplay_description: Automatically advance to the next clip when the current clip ends.

match.lengthPlural=one: Are you sure you want to clear {length} log?
match.lengthPlural=other: Are you sure you want to clear {length} logs?

command_clear: Remove all clips in the queue.
command_prefix_description: Commands in chat must be prefixed by this value.
command_remove_by_submitter: Remove clips sent by the submitter.
creator: Creator

match.lengthPlural=one: Are you sure you want to delete {length} clip from the history?
match.lengthPlural=other: Are you sure you want to delete {length} clips from the history?

logger_level_description: The lowest level of logs to capture. Any log levels above the selected level will also be logged.
logger_size_limit_description: The maximum number of logs to keep. When the limit is reached, the oldest logs will be removed.
message_no_providers_enabled: No providers enabled. Please enable one in the settings.
primary_color_description: Primary color used throughout the UI.
purge_cache_confirm: Are you sure you want to purge all clips cached locally?
purge_cache_description: Clips submitted may be cached for future use. Purge all cached clips.
purge_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to purge all clips from the history?
purge_history_description: Purge all clips previously viewed allowing them to be resubmitted.
reset_settings_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to the default values?
reset_settings_description: Reset settings back to their initial values.
size_limit_description: The number of clips allowed in the queue. Leave empty for no limit.
sora_allowed_cameos_description: Only allow Sora cameo videos featuring these usernames. Leave empty to allow all cameos.
surface_color_description: Surface color used throughout the UI.
unsupported_clip: Unsupported clip. You may need to enable the platform of this clip.
